text:
Assaria is a city in Saline County, Kansas, United States. In 2010, 413 people lived there.
History.
Assaria was planned out in 1879. The first post office in Assaria was created in September 1879.
Geography.
Assaria is at (38.680374, -97.604029). The United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
People.
It is part of the Salina Micropolitan Statistical Area.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 413 people, 159 households, and 122 families living in Assaria.
Education.
Assaria is served by USD 306 Southeast of Saline.
